snippet.title: Classic Game Room - SPACECHASE Atari 2600 review
snippet.description: SpaceChase review. Classic Game Room reviews SPACECHASE for Atari 2600 from Apollo released in 1981. Space Chase is a Space Invaders style game that feels like a vertical scrolling SHMUP spaceship shooter because of the scrolling background with mountains and canyons! This slick looking game on Atari 2600 has predictable, fun gameplay where you score points by wasting alien space ships and staying alive! Space Chase video review on Atari 2600 has gameplay from Spacechase for Atari by Apollo Games.
